title: thunderbird
content: Hi Had an old computer with passwords but has died trying to restart ThunderBird but can't find old password. How can I change the password please .. Ross Email to wross269@gmail thanks

title: In Thunderbird, mapping Outlook folders to GMail folders
content: Have 2 email accounts that Thunderbird picks up: Outlook and GMail. Would like to push EVERYTHING downloaded to Outlook folders (from Outlook.live.com) to my GMail account folders. Seems like it should be easy, but I'm not having good success. Can anyone help or point me in the right direction?
creator: dalewebb1
